name: The Forgotten City (itch)
description:
This is a 2d parkour exploration game.

Some jumps might take a few tries, but i assure you they're all very doable.

Controls
  • Arrow Keys - Move
  • Z - Jump
  • Q - Quit
  • R - Reset position to start (you won't lose progress)
  • F - Toggle Fullscreen
  • M - Toggle Music
  • V - Next Track

Contains music ©2019 Joshua McLean (mrjoshuamclean.com)
